perturbation.original_text: This agreement will be governed by and must be construed in accordance with the laws of the State of Israel. All disputes arising pursuant to this Agreement shall be exclusively brought in the courts of competent jurisdiction residing in Tel Aviv, Israel.
perturbation.changed_text: This agreement will be governed by the laws of the State of Israel. Disputes arising pursuant to this Agreement shall be brought in a forum selected at YEC's discretion.
perturbation.explanation: By removing 'must be construed in accordance with' the obligatory nature of following Israeli law is weakened. Also, removing 'exclusively' and replacing 'the courts of competent jurisdiction residing in Tel Aviv, Israel' with 'a forum selected at YEC's discretion' could potentially force ARGO to litigate in a jurisdiction unfavorable to them, violating standard legal protections regarding fair venue and access to justice as might be implied or specifically protected under Israeli contract law.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Israeli Contract Law (General Part) Law, 5733-1973, and principles of fairness and good faith in contractual relationships.

perturbation.original_text: Each of the parties agrees that money damages will not be a sufficient remedy for any breach of the above agreement relating to non- solicitation of personnel. Accordingly, a party will be entitled to specific performance and injunctive or other equitable relief as a remedy for any such breach, and the parties each further agree to waive any requirement for the securing or posting of any bond in connection with such remedy.
perturbation.changed_text: Each of the parties agrees that money damages may not be a sufficient remedy for any breach of the above agreement relating to non- solicitation of personnel. A party may be entitled to specific performance as a remedy for any such breach.
perturbation.explanation: By weakening the clause which ensures that the parties are granted specific performance and injunctive or other equitable relief for breaches relating to the non-solicitation of personnel, the contract potentially violates implied labor laws in Israel which aim to protect employees against undue influence from their former employers.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Israeli law pertaining to the protection of employees and fair competition, implied terms related to good faith and fair dealing.
